scripts.build: tsc && node --no-warnings --no-deprecation --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only scripts/build-date.ts && echo Build Finished
scripts.up:d: sudo docker compose pull && sudo docker compose up -d
scripts.up: sudo docker compose pull && sudo docker compose up
scripts.up:db: sudo docker compose pull && sudo docker compose up -d postgres redis
scripts.dev: npm run down && npm run up:dev
scripts.dev:build: npm run down && npm run up
scripts.update: git pull && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && docker compose pull && npm run down && npm run up:d
